title: Warring Kingdoms Katarina Drawing in exchange for 1 RP
body:
Hi, my name is AzureBlaz, and I've played League for about 4 years now. I've been stuck at 974RP forever, and the options in the store are only multiples of 5 now... So I just left it.

Then Warring Kingdoms Katarina came out.

I instantly fell in love with the skin and the splash art, so I decided to make a tribute to the beautiful splash art, in exchange for 1 RP. Disclaimer, I am NOT an artist by ANY means whatsoever. Just some guy who had a pencil and paper and a couple hours to kill. Riot, I'm counting on you so I can rep my favorite Noxian assassin in all of her Warring Kingdoms glory.

replies.body:
Nicely done! 

Player Support would be the ones to ask for the 1RP. :] 

You can ask them by submitting a ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
send a ticket in to riot with this

> [{quoted}](name=AzureBlaz,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=yzV1o90z,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-02-13T03:51:57.185+0000)
>
> ...What's a ticket?

A support ticket. Search riot support and then find submit a request. This lets you send a request to a rioter. I have gotten rp from them in this way. It might take a day or two.
...What? You never heard of sending a ticket in your 4 years of playing o.o lol
ask for more like 260ish, this is a good drawing.
Ahahaha, I'm not greedy. It's just there's no more way for me to clear the 4 RP remaining there, and this is about the only way I can think of to ask nicely. But thank you for the compliment!

Artist or not, that is a very good drawing anyways. Still better than ones who can only do stick figures, like me =c Maybe your secret talent is to be an artist on the Riot Art Team in a few years. =P
They should definitely give him more rp than that for this art, I like it, if it he colored it even more!

Yeah as said before, send a ticket to riot with this drawing instead of on the forums.

 I remember when I drew them Sona for that needed 1RP
send this picture in a ticket to riot and they should give u the 1 rp
